img.alt: Picture of Welcome to Bloomfield Sign

h2.style: font-size: 20px; font-family: asapbold; background-color: rgb(254, 192, 15); border-bottom: 8px solid rgb(225, 153, 13); margin: 0px; padding: 7px;

div.h2: Welcome to the Bloomfield School District

div.div:
On behalf of the volunteers who serve on the School Board, our faculty, staff and students, it is my pleasure to welcome you to the Bloomfield School District.
We hope you find all of the information provided through the Bloomfield School District website helpful and informative.
Bloomfield has an excellent school system made of outstanding faculty, a wonderful student body, and a very supportive school community that values high quality education and programs.
As a former Bloomfield High School graduate and a long time community member I take great pride in our community.
We as a district also take great pride in our achievements and are passionate about the service and opportunity we provide every one of our students.
GO BOBCATS!
Thank you for your continued support of our School District.
Dr. Kimberly Mizell, Ph.D.
Superintendent
